parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and violent shaking of the front end and steering wheel, known as the "Death Wobble," can cause loss of vehicle control, increasing the risk of accidents and potentially leading to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The front end and steering wheel shake violently
the vehicle shakes uncontrollably
the vehicle requires coming to a complete stop to regain control
the steering damper needs to be replaced multiple times
the linkage and suspension are faulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Suspension and Steering System Instability
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The instability of the front suspension and steering system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The steering wheel shakes violently
the front wheels hop or vibrate
the vehicle feels unstable or out of control
the vehicle requires significant effort to regain control
the issue occurs when driving over bumps or grooved surfaces.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden opening of the tailgate while driving can cause loss of cargo, damage to the vehicle, and potentially lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The tailgate opens unexpectedly while driving
even when the fob and internal buttons are not pressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Lock and Latch Failure in Cold Weather
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of door locks and latches in cold weather can cause doors to fly open while driving, potentially ejecting passengers or causing accidents.
symptoms: Door locks do not operate in cold weather
doors do not latch shut
and doors may open unexpectedly while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbags to deploy in a crash can lead to severe injuries or fatalities, as the occupants are not adequately protected from the impact.
symptoms: No airbag deployment in a crash
despite meeting the deployment criteria
resulting in injuries or fatalities to the occupants.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Continental ContiTrac Tire Tread Separation and Vibration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of tread plies and poor tire molding techniques can cause excessive vehicle vibration at highway speeds, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Excessive vehicle vibration at highway speeds
uneven tire wear
noise while driving
difficulty maintaining control of the vehicle.
